parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> Arma 3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the color of item's picture (left) with the given index of the listbox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to the given color. Color is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]. Color which consists from only zeros means disable this override.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetPictureColor''' [idc, index, color]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, name]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetPictureColor''' [index, color]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, name]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[lbSetPictureColor]] [101, 0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lbSetPictureColor]] [0, [1, 1, 1, 1]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbSetPictureColorSelected]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]], [[lbSetPicture]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the [[CT_LISTBOX]] command family can be found [[CT_LISTBOX#Scripting_Example|here]].
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 18, 2015 - 09:55 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
(Arma 3 1.48) To give an image on the right side of a listbox item:
<code>_ctrl lbSetPictureRightColor [_index, [1,1,1,0.7]];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
